learning_outcomes.description: Apply advanced statistical learning techniques to develop and implement sophisticated models in artificial intelligence using software packages like PyTorch.

Develop the ability to translate theoretical concepts into practical solutions through hands-on exercises in machine learning, focusing on methods like Support Vector Machines, Gaussian processes and Artificial Neural Networks.
Analyse contemporary topics such as Diffusion Models, Generative AI, double descent, and benign overfitting to address modern challenges in statistical learning.
Design and implement effective data science processes using machine learning methodologies to address real-world problems.
Collaborate effectively in teams to develop authentic data science solutions.

assessments.task_description: The assignments will be on work covered in the lectures. There will be three equally weighted assignments, each due at 16:00 on the Friday of Weeks 4, 8, and 11, respectively.
assessments.submission_guidelines: Assignments should be submitted in PDF format via the Blackboard system.
assessments.deferral_or_extension: You may be able to apply for an extension.
assessments.late_submission: A penalty of 10% of the maximum possible mark will be deducted per 24 hours from time submission is due for up to 7 days. After 7 days, you will receive a mark of 0.
assessments.additional_info: You may be able to apply for an extension.

assessments.task_description:
For the Research Project, you will be expected to design a study and conduct it using at least one algorithm covered in this course, applying it to both artificial and real data. You will then prepare a report that includes the following components:

  • A review of at least five research papers focusing on the theoretical development of the algorithm
  • Formulation of the research problem
  • Details regarding the generation of artificial data
  • Details of the implementation of the machine learning algorithm
  • Interpretation of the results obtained

The research project will be completed in groups of up to four students.
assessments.submission_guidelines: Assignments should be submitted in PDF format via the Blackboard system.
assessments.deferral_or_extension: You may be able to apply for an extension.
assessments.late_submission: A penalty of 10% of the maximum possible mark will be deducted per 24 hours from time submission is due for up to 7 days. After 7 days, you will receive a mark of 0.
assessments.additional_info: You may be able to apply for an extension.
